comment._content: Oscar Wilder Underwood III (1862-1929), Senator from Alabama: bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=U000013

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913 he was in the news for his work on the Underwood Tariff Bill. Here's the woefully incomplete Wikipedia bio of Underwood: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oscar_Underwood
